Class DocumentIdentityMap

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.avalon.framework.logger.AbstractLogEnabled
      org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.DocumentIdentityMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
IdentifiableFactory, org.apache.avalon.framework.logger.LogEnabled
public class DocumentIdentityMap
extends org.apache.avalon.framework.logger.AbstractLogEnabled
implements IdentifiableFactory

A DocumentIdentityMap avoids the multiple instanciation of a document object.

Version:
$Id: DocumentIdentityMap.java 264153 2005-08-29 15:11:14Z andreas $
